Preview & Submit

Types of Submissions

Research Articles

Original research presenting new findings, methodologies, or significant advances in the field. Typically 5,000-8,000 words.

Review Articles

Comprehensive, critical analyses of existing literature on specific topics. Usually 8,000-12,000 words with extensive references.

Short Communications

Brief reports of significant preliminary findings or novel methodologies. Limited to 2,500 words.

Case Studies

Detailed examination of specific instances, applications, or phenomena with broader implications. 3,000-5,000 words.

Journal Information
